channel.title: Confusion of Virt-Manager is deprecated
channel.description:
Some users think Virt-Manager is deprecated, But according to:
https://blog.wikichoon.com/2020/06/virt-manager-deprecated-in-rhel.html
> TL;DR: I'm the primary author of virt-manager. virt-manager is deprecated in RHEL8 in favor of cockpit, but ONLY in RHEL8 and future RHEL releases. The upstream project virt-manager is still maintained and is still relevant for other distros.
Only will effect RHEL, Not the upstream or other distros.
